ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Fits generalized linear models using the same model specification as glm in the stats package, but with a modified default fitting method that provides greater stability for models that may fail to converge using glm.

Fits generalized linear models using the same model specification as glm in the stats package, but with a modified default fitting method that provides greater stability for models that may fail to converge using glm.

name: r-glm2
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.2.1" %}

{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-glm2
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  fn: glm2_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url:
    - https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/glm2_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/glm2/glm2_{{ version }}.tar.gz

  sha256: 3e0d4e6db8eab3e498fa3f2376b3ae592f92dd9b412fda8fff6f084defa6d8af

build:
  noarch: generic
  number: 1007

  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - r-base

  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('glm2')"  # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('glm2')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=glm2
  license: GPL (>= 2)
  summary: Fits generalized linear models using the same model specification as glm in the stats
    package, but with a modified default fitting method that provides greater stability
    for models that may fail to converge using glm.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'  # [unix]
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}\R\share\licenses\GPL-3'  # [win]
extra:
   recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - MathiasHaudgaard
    - FrodePedersen
    - ArneKr
